AMINO ACIDS: Predominant chemical forms in which nitrogen is transported
Unique to friedelane type triterpene cyclases
ANTHOCYANINS: Group of phenolic compounds responsible for red blue and violet colouration
PERICYCLE: A layer of cells in the root that can resume division to initiate lr
Outermost layer of the stele in plant roots
PLASMA MEMBRANE: The interface between the plant cell and the soil solution
STAMEN: The male reproductive organ of a flower
